character.update-message: Character version is outdated. Do you want to update it?
character.remove-message: Are you sure you want to remove this character?

messages.update: Character version is outdated. Update it?
messages.remove: Are you sure you want to remove {name}?

description.placeholder: Define your character's appearance, personality, and background.
description.label: Description

trouble.name: Trouble
trouble.description: The main complication in your character's life.

milestone.name: Milestone
milestone.description: A significant event in your character's life.

other.name: Other
other.description: An aspect that doesn't fit into the other categories.

mild.name: Mild
mild.description: A mild consequence is a minor injury or setback.

moderate.name: Moderate
moderate.description: A moderate consequence is a significant injury or setback.

severe.name: Severe
severe.description: A severe consequence is a major injury or setback.

physical.name: Physical
physical.description: Physical stress represents the physical toll that conflicts take on you.

mental.name: Mental
mental.description: Mental stress represents the mental toll that conflicts take on you.

stunt.priceTooHigh: Stunt price should be less than {value}.
stunt.priceInteger: Stunt price must be an integer.

stress.empty: At least one stress box should exist.
stress.integer: Stress value must be an integer.
stress.tooHigh: Stress value should be less than {value}.

item.countTooHigh: Item count should be less than {value}.

athletics.name: Athletics
athletics.description: Represents your ability to move quickly and gracefully.

rapport.name: Rapport
rapport.description: Your skill in making positive connections with others.

notice.name: Notice
notice.description: Your ability to spot things and react quickly.

drive.name: Drive
drive.description: Represents your ability to pilot vehicles.

burglary.name: Burglary
burglary.description: Your skill in breaking and entering.

contacts.name: Contacts
contacts.description: Your network of acquaintances and connections.

provoke.name: Provoke
provoke.description: Your ability to incite and goad others.

investigate.name: Investigate
investigate.description: Your skill in finding and piecing together clues.

craft.name: Craft
craft.description: Your ability to build and repair things.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Your ability to avoid being seen or heard.

empathy.name: Empathy
empathy.description: Your ability to read and understand others.
